mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO (USER_ID, USER_SEQ, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, ADDR1, ADDR2, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT) VALUES (#{userId}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(USER_SEQ),0)+1 FROM USER_INFO), #{userName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT USER_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NAME, EMAIL, ADDR1 FROM USER_INFO ORDER BY REG_DT
SELECT USER_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NAME, EMAIL, ADDR1 FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
